## JsPlumbInstance.setSuspendDrawing() method

Sets whether or not drawing is suspended.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setSuspendDrawing(val?: boolean, repaintAfterwards?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  val | boolean | True to suspend, false to enable. |
|  repaintAfterwards | boolean | If true, repaint everything afterwards. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
